description: This file defines an interface class IEventHandler with several callback methods related to container state events in the WPEFramework Plugin namespace.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface class that declares callback methods for container events such as start, stop, failure, and state change.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container starts, with event data provided as a JsonObject reference.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container stops, with event data provided as a JsonObject reference.

methods.name: onContainerFailed
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container encounters a failure, with event data provided as a JsonObject reference.

methods.name: onContainerStateChange
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container changes state, with event data provided as a JsonObject reference.
